function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate hospital infrastructure for dealing with airborne infections","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of airborne infections, leading to higher infection rates and greater risk of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing airborne infection control policies and restructuring hospital design to address airborne infection transmission","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ultraviolet light for air sterilization, and improved ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Historical pandemic experiences inform architectural design","Impact":"The lessons learned from past pandemics are not incorporated into hospital architecture design, leading to increased risk of transmission of communicable infections","Mitigation":"Incorporating architectural features that mitigate the spread of communicable infections, based on lessons from past pandemics","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ultraviolet light for air sterilization, and improved ventilation systems","People":"Architects, hospital administrators, healthcare facility management","Owner":"Architects, hospital administration, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Insufficient policies and infrastructure for addressing airborne infections","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of airborne infections, leading to higher infection rates and greater risk of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementing airborne infection control policies and restructuring hospital design to address airborne infection transmission","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ultraviolet light for air sterilization, and improved ventilation systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital administration, healthcare facility management"}]}
